articles.description: Jack Draper is the first of four Britons in third-round singles action at the US Open - follow live text and Radio 5 Live commentary.
articles.title: US Open: Draper first of four Britons in singles action - radio & text

articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Liam Smith takes on Chris Eubanks Jr in a rematch in Manchester.
articles.title: Smith v Eubank 2: Updates from middleweight contest

articles.description: The sky seems to be the limit for Brighton striker Evan Ferguson after the teenager's hat-trick saw him join a very select Premier League club.
articles.title: How good is Ferguson - and how far can he go?

articles.description: Marco Silva condemns match officials for allowing Man City's second goal in Fulham's 5-1 loss at the Eithad as Erling Haaland admits he would also have been "fuming".
articles.title: Haaland backs Silva's condemnation of match officials

articles.description: Jack Draper continues to put his recent injury problems behind him by reaching the US Open fourth round in a career-best run at a major.
articles.title: Britain's Draper into US Open last 16

articles.description: Chamari Athapaththu stars as Sri Lanka record their first ever victory over England in T20 internationals.
articles.title: England slump to first T20 defeat by Sri Lanka

articles.description: Fulham manager Marco Silva describes the video assistant referee's controversial decision to allow Nathan Ake's goal in his side's 5-1 defeat by Manchester City as a "huge mistake".
articles.title: VAR decision 'huge mistake from people who don't play football'

articles.description: If form runs its normal way, Ferrari don't have a chance of beating Max Verstappen in Sunday's Italian Grand Prix - but Carlos Sainz says "it can happen".
articles.title: 'Sainz daring to dream that he can beat Verstappen'

articles.description: Son Heung-min scored his fifth Tottenham hat-trick at Burnley on Saturday, but there was much more to the Spurs skipper's performance than just his goals.
articles.title: 'Outstanding' Son leading by example at Spurs

articles.description: Summer signing Anthony Elanga's first Nottingham Forest goal secures a hard-fought Premier League victory over Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Elanga's first Forest goal sinks Chelsea
